item.title: Sponsoring community events (SCE)
item.description: Sponsoring community events – is it right for you? This series of posts will take you through the things you need to know to help you decide. Over the coming weeks, this new series will go through the in’s and out’s of sponsoring community events. Community events are fantastic from an attendee perspective, but when you’re handing over cash you need to know what you’re letting yourself in for and how you get return on investment (ROI).
